entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mont-Laurier

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 17.
